backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining data types (Equipment, SparePart, CataloguingRecord, MaintenanceRecord, Document, UserProfile) and storage maps with access control, user profiles, and engineering discipline utilities.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two features: dynamic spare part form rendering based on uploaded attribute definitions (REQ-21) and connecting AttributeTemplateImport to use uploaded files instead of static templates (REQ-22).
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities with details on authentication, form handling, data types, and query operations.
frontend/DRAFT_REBUILD_TRIGGER.md: Marker file with timestamp used to trigger fresh draft builds without modifying application functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors including sidebar, charts, and UI component tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tags and root div for React app mounting, titled 'Asset Management App'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for equipment, spare parts, cataloguing, maintenance, documents, reports, import, and global search, wrapped in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AccessControlIni: Empty component file for access control initialization banner (no implementation present).
frontend/src/components/AttributeTemplat: Component for uploading Excel files containing attribute definitions with drag-and-drop support, file validation, progress tracking, and integration with useImportAttributeTemplate mutation.
frontend/src/components/AutocompleteText: Reusable autocomplete text input with portaled dropdown, keyboard navigation, filtered suggestions, and click-outside handling to prevent clipping issues.
frontend/src/components/ConfirmDialog.ts: A reusable confirmation dialog component built on AlertDialog that supports customizable title, description, confirm/cancel text, and optional destructive styling.
Equipment selection component with a dropdown select and filterable overlay that searches by equipment number, tag number, or name, supporting bigint IDs.
frontend/src/components/EquipmentNameDro: Equipment name input component using AutocompleteTextInput with static EQUIPMENT_NAMES suggestions and free-typing support.
Reusable form field wrapper component that displays label, required indicator, help text, error messages, and child input elements.
frontend/src/components/GlobalSearch.tsx: Global search interface for equipment and spare parts with debounced search, collapsible filters, sorting controls, and session-persisted filter state.
frontend/src/components/GlobalSearchFilt: Filter panel component for global search supporting discipline, equipment type, date range, and result type filters with controlled state management.
frontend/src/components/HeaderAuthContro: Authentication control button for Internet Identity login/logout with loading states, error handling, and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/PageLayout.tsx: Main application layout component with header navigation, responsive mobile menu, authentication control, and footer with branding.
frontend/src/components/SparePartAdvance: Advanced spare parts search interface with multiple filter fields (equipment no, tag, part number, etc.), debounced queries, and results table display.
frontend/src/components/SparePartEquipme: Displays and manages equipment links for a spare part, allowing users to add/remove equipment associations with confirmation dialogs and toast notifications.
Provides a searchable dropdown for selecting spare parts, filtering by part number, name, manufacturer part number, or description with a scrollable overlay.
frontend/src/components/SparePartMasterF: Main form for creating or editing spare parts with noun/modifier selection, dynamic attribute fields, auto-generated descriptions, and validation.
frontend/src/components/SparePartNameDro: Autocomplete dropdown for spare part names using a static suggestion list with free-typing support via AutocompleteTextInput component.
frontend/src/components/SparePartNumberL: Searchable lookup component for spare parts by number or description with keyboard navigation and dropdown selection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, admin token initialization, and query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Custom hook that debounces a value by delaying updates until after a specified delay period has elapsed.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profiles, equipment, spare parts, cataloguing records, maintenance records, and documents with CRUD operations and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components like primary, secondary, destructive, borders, and charts.
frontend/src/lib/cataloguingTemplates.ts: Defines cataloguing templates for different equipment types (mechanical, electrical, instrumentation, piping) with predefined fields and input types for structured data entry.
frontend/src/lib/csvImport.ts: CSV parsing utilities with validation functions for equipment and spare part rows, including helpers for parsing dates and BigInt values from CSV data.
frontend/src/lib/dates.ts: Date formatting utilities to convert between bigint nanosecond timestamps and human-readable date strings or Date objects.
frontend/src/lib/descriptionGenerator.ts: Generates concise spare part descriptions by combining noun, modifier, and key attributes with prioritization of common fields like size, material, and type.
frontend/src/lib/disciplines.ts: Engineering discipline enum mappings and conversion utilities between EngineeringDiscipline enum values and human-readable labels (MECHANICAL, ELECTRICAL, INSTRUMENTATION, PIPING).
frontend/src/lib/errors.ts: Error normalization and extraction utilities that parse backend trap errors, canister rejection codes, and authentication errors into user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/lib/exports.ts: Provides functions to export data to CSV and PDF formats, and download CSV templates. Includes manual PDF generation using raw PDF syntax.
frontend/src/lib/files.ts: Utility functions for converting browser File objects to ExternalBlob with upload progress tracking, and formatting file sizes for display.
frontend/src/lib/filtering.ts: Filters equipment and spare parts based on discipline, equipment type, and date range criteria from FilterState.
frontend/src/lib/importMappings.ts: Defines CSV template headers and mapping functions to convert CSV row data into Equipment and SparePart objects with flexible column name matching.
frontend/src/lib/productionChecks.ts: Runtime validation functions to verify backend canister has required methods, helping diagnose production deployment issues.
frontend/src/lib/sorting.ts: Implements sorting logic for equipment and spare parts by relevance, name, number, or date with configurable direction and relevance scoring.
frontend/src/lib/staticNameLists.ts: Provides static sorted lists of common equipment and spare part names for autocomplete dropdown suggestions.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Validates attribute values against definitions including type checking, required fields, min/max constraints, and regex patterns parsed from validation rule strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/CataloguingPage.tsx: Cataloguing module page with tabs for importing attribute templates, managing spare part master data, and advanced search functionality. Shows authentication requirement and backend update notice.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentsPage.tsx: Placeholder page for document management feature that displays an alert indicating the feature requires backend methods (createDocument, uploadDocument, updateDocumentMetadata) not yet implemented.
frontend/src/pages/EquipmentListPage.tsx: Equipment list view page with search, filtering by discipline, and CRUD operations (edit/delete). Includes authentication checks, inline editing dialog, and confirmation dialog for deletions.
frontend/src/pages/EquipmentMasterPage.t: Main equipment creation page with a form for adding new equipment records and navigation cards to other features (list, spare parts, maintenance, documents, reports, import). Handles authentication and displays next equipment number.
frontend/src/pages/GlobalSearchPage.tsx: Global search page that renders the GlobalSearch component for authenticated users, or displays a login prompt for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/ImportPage.tsx: CSV import page supporting bulk equipment and spare parts creation with file upload, preview, validation, template download, and batch processing with progress tracking and error reporting.
frontend/src/pages/MaintenancePage.tsx: Placeholder page for maintenance records feature that displays an alert indicating the feature requires backend methods (createMaintenanceRecord, deleteMaintenanceRecord) not yet implemented.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Reports page with tabbed views for equipment list, spare parts, and maintenance due reports, featuring equipment lookup, data tables, and CSV/PDF export functionality for each report type.
frontend/src/pages/SparePartsPage.tsx: Main spare parts management page component with tabs for creating/linking parts, search functionality, equipment association, and CRUD operations using React hooks and UI components.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, typography, animations, and design tokens for the application's styling system.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking architectural state, features, and pending requirements for implementing dynamic attribute field rendering from uploaded Excel files for spare part cataloguing.
